Uses of Interface
fil.sr1.commandhandler.CommandHandler

Packages that use CommandHandler
Package Description
fil.sr1.commandhandler
Contains the logic allowing us to associate the commands sent by the client to their respective logic/to their handler
fil.sr1.commandhandler.commands
Contains all the implementations and logic related to the command received by the FTP server, one class equals one command

  • Uses of CommandHandler in fil.sr1.commandhandler

    Methods in fil.sr1.commandhandler that return CommandHandler
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static CommandHandler CommandHandlerFactory.build​(String command, ClientFtp clientFtp)
    Return the command handler matching the FTP command and its argument received if the user has the right status.
